description: When a console url is used in an iframe the initial HTTP_REFERER set may not (and likely will not) have a token, as it is the url of the page in which the iframe is embedded, causing a 401 unauthorized to be shown.
title: nova-ajax-console-proxy doesn't work properly when console url is used in iframe

comments.content: When a console url is used in an iframe the initial HTTP_REFERER set may not (and likely will not) have a token, as it is the url of the page in which the iframe is embedded, causing a 401 unauthorized to be shown.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane

comments.content: Ryan, do you still plan to add tests to your proposed branch ?

comments.content: de-assigning since nothing has happened in 6 months. Obviously, feel free to pick it up again Ryan

comments.content: Ajaxterm is being deprecated in favor of VNC Console
